title: Resorts and Hotels in the Philippines | Discovery Resorts and Hotels
description: From city staycations to island getaways, The Discovery Leisure Company’s homegrown group of hotels and resorts are found in only the most distinctive locations around the Philippines. Delight in authentic experiences unique to the destination, whether you’re in Boracay, Palawan, Tagaytay, Makati or Ortigas.
keywords: hotels, discovery, discover, staycations, resorts, boracay, palawan, tagaytay, makati, ortigas
